name: WuXu's Library++
subtitle: The Most Up-To-Date IPA Library on AltStore.
description:
Welcome to WuXu’s Library++!

This source contains all your favourite tweaked apps, free streaming, cracked apps, and more!

This highly organised AltSource is made up of many different tweaked apps that I, myself, inject each and every deb/dylib (tweak) into. While making sure everything is working perfectly and to my standards.

This source is updated 2-3 times a week, or more depending on the urgency. But I am working on automating updates through a python bot which I am close to completing.

If you enjoy my source please spread the word, this is essentially an updated QuarkSources, and I would like it to be as big, if not, bigger!

To make requests, get support or chat with other users, join the discord server! https://discord.gg/nKXsSdbEDc

WuXu’s Sources Official Website: https://wuxu1.github.io/

apps.name: HD Flix (No Ads)
apps.subtitle: The All-In-One Movie app for iOS
apps.localizedDescription:
WHEN YOU FIRST OPEN THE APP IT WILL LOOK LIKE A DIFFERENT APP JUST WAIT AND IT WILL CHANGE TO THE MOVIE APP

With HD Flix for iOS you can able to watch any movie/tv show. The User Interface that you see in the app is truly the best thing about it. Easy navigation and responsive design made it stand at the top of the list.

It will display all the trending content from Action, Comedy, Sci-Fi and other genres at the home page for the best user experience. Moreover, you will get to read the complete information about any particular movie including IMDB Rating, Year Of Release, Start Cast, etc.

apps.name: X++
apps.subtitle: An new tweak for X!
apps.localizedDescription:
Features:

• Download Videos (even if account private).
• Replay later feature.
• Video zoom feature.
• No history feature.
• Hide topics tweet feature.
• Disable video layer caption.
• Padlock.
• Font changer.
• Auto load photos in highest quality feature
• Undo tweet feature.
• Reader mode feature.
• Disable new tweet style (A.K.A edge to edge tweet)
• Enable voice tweet and voice message in DM.
• Hide promoted tweet from the timeline.
• Confirm alert when hit the tweet button.
• Confirm alert when hit like button.
• FLEX for debugging.

• And more!

apps.name: Deezer++
apps.subtitle: Deezer with premium activated!
apps.localizedDescription:
Deezer is a music streaming platform that enables you to match The Power of Music to your lifestyle and identity.

Enjoy a massive music catalog that has everything and more with in-built algorithms that learn what you like and recommend more of it. The Deezer music player is your companion across all devices, providing access to the artists, songs and communities that speak to you. Discover and create playlists in your favorite genres: hip hop, rap, rock, lofi. No WiFi needed — download songs and enjoy offline music — perfect for when at home or on the go.

This is the most personalized and intuitive listening experience, brought to you from the home of music.

With Deezer Free*, you'll get all you need in one app:

• Flow, our feature for infinite, personalized mixes (on-point recommendations every time)
• SongCatcher, for identifying any song playing around you (try singing or humming for magic results)
• Game on with music quiz (see how fast you can guess your favorite song)
• A ludicrously-large catalog (go on, try to find a song that isn't there)
• The freedom to play music based on moods, niche genres and scenes
• Personal and collaborative playlists, favorites, radio* and more
• Dive deeper into the music with the Lyrics feature and translated lyrics
• Sleep timer function (for those beauty Zzzzzz)
• Sharing function for spreading the love on socials


Looking for a level up? Switch to Deezer Premium**, Deezer Family** or Deezer Student** and you'll benefit from these added perks:

• No ads, ever!
• Offline listening (just cause the signal cuts doesn't mean the music has to)
• Unlimited skips, unlimited listening
• HiFi sound (High Fidelity, lossless quality at 1,411 kbps)
• FLAC-standard quality on millions of tracks
• High-end sound system compatibility

Compatible devices:
Get Deezer on all your connected devices — Google Nest, HomePod Mini, Amazon Alexa, Sonos and more.
apps.versionDescription: • Updated Deezer to v7.15.0 - Last working version with tweak.

versions.localizedDescription: • Updated Deezer to v7.15.0 - Last working version with tweak.

apps.name: SoundCloud++
apps.subtitle: SoundCloud with no ads! Read Description.
apps.localizedDescription:
DOES NOT WORK ON ALTSTORE/SIDESTORE. Requires Trollstore/Cert to install

Enhance your SoundCloud experience with the following features:

• Remove Ads
• Remove Promoted Playlists
• Remove Upsell Buttons


HOW TO INSTALL IF NOT WORKING

(iOS 15):

1. Download the REGULAR SoundCloud app from the app store (IMPORTANT)
2. Sign in to the app
3. Delete the app while still signed in
4. Download the IPA (app file) from the table below.
5. Install using your preferred sideloading method** (AltStore, Sideloadly, appdb, etc.)
6. Once installed, you can enjoy, as you should be logged in already.


(iOS 16):

1. Until fixed, users will have to link a Google or Facebook account to their SoundCloud. This can be done on the SoundCloud website.
2. Download the IPA (app file) from the table below.
3. Install using your preferred sideloading method** (AltStore, Sideloadly, appdb, etc.)
4. Sign in using your Google or Facebook account
5. Use the same method uYou used for bypassing the unsafe installation login error


(iOS 16) [Method 2]:

1. Until fixed, users will have to link a Google or Facebook account to their SoundCloud. This can be done on the SoundCloud website.
2. Download the REGULAR SoundCloud app from the AppStore
3. Sign in to the app using Google or Facebook Account sign-in
4. Delete the app while still signed in
5. Download the IPA (app file) from the table below.
6. Install using your preferred sideloading method** (AltStore, Sideloadly, appdb, etc.)
7. Once installed, you can enjoy, as you should be logged in already.

versions.localizedDescription: • Updated SoundCloud to v7.65.4
• Updated SoundCloud to v7.14.0
• Updated SoundCloud to v7.2.0

apps.name: Spotify++ (NEW)
apps.subtitle: A new and improved Spotify tweak!
apps.localizedDescription:
This tweak makes Spotify think that you have a Premium subscription, granting free listening, just like Spotilife.

Although there are restrictions:

• Using "Very High" audio quality
• Downloading songs/playlists (podcast downloads work, though)
apps.versionDescription:
• Updated Spotify to v9.0.20
• Updated Eevee to v5.8.7

versions.localizedDescription:
• Updated Spotify to v9.0.20
• Updated Eevee to v5.8.7

(5.4 - Current)

• Updated Ukrainian localization by @LIKVIDATOR1337
• Updated Turkish localization by @gototheskinny
• Updated Danish localization by @UnexcitingDean

(5.3)

• Liked Songs on artist page
• Improved Reset Data option (now clears /Library/Caches/ too, progress animation)
• Updated dumped configuration; fixed app crashes when clicking on three dots on song page
• Updated swift-protobuf to 1.28.1 and Swift to version 6 (Xcode 16.0)
• Fixed Download action app crashes, improved its hooking logic
• PetitLyrics is now available for everyone
• Updated Simplified Chinese localization by @xiangfeidexiaohuo
• Updated Traditional Chinese localizaton by @ElliotCHEN37
• Updated Vietnamese localization by @Richard-NDC

(5.2)

• Brazil loc by @emal0n
• French localization corrections by @5jd

(5.1)

• French localization by @5jd

(5.0)

• Danish localization by @UnexcitingDean
• Swiss German localization by @An0n-00
• Polish localization by @CukierDev
• Nepalese localization by @3xynos7
• German localization corrections by @wlxxd
• Azerbaijani localization by @by3lish

(4.9)

• Musixmatch source support for local files
• Lyrics colors support for local files
• Bulgarian localization by @schweppes-0x
• Traditional Chinese localization corrections by @Neo1102
• Korean localization by @speedyfriend433
• Vietnamese localization by @Richard-NDC
• German localization by @wlxxd
• Persian localization by @Incognito-Coder

(4.8)

• Fixed original lyrics colors
• Spanish localization by @longopy
• Simplified Chinese localization by @xiangfeidexiaohuo
• Italian localization by @LivioZ
• Russian localization
• Ukrainian localization by @LIKVIDATOR1337
• Turkish localization by @gototheskinny
• Traditional Chinese localization by @ElliotCHEN37

(4.7)

• Fixed lyrics not appearing issue
• Fixed Premium patching for recent versions; removed static method
• Musixmatch romanization and translation now work simultaneously
• Added localizations support; feel free to open pull requests with your .lproj

(4.6)

• Fixed popups white background bug on iPad

(4.5)

• Musixmatch lyrics translation is now integrated natively
• Local lyrics romanization for all sources
• PetitLyrics source (only for Japanese users)
• Added instrumental lyrics message
• Fixed Musixmatch language code issues for some languages
• Fixed native popups white background bug agian
• Other minor improvements

(4.4)

• Fixed crashes on iOS 14 (Spotify 8.9.8) and added support for 8.9.54
• Redesigned Settings
• Option to show romanized lyrics on Musixmatch and Genius
• Option to show translated Musixmatch lyrics
• Musixmatch lyrics translation is now integrated natively
• Local lyrics romanization for all sources
• PetitLyrics source (only for Japanese users)
• Added instrumental lyrics message
• Fixed Musixmatch language code issues for some languages
• Fixed native popups white background bug agian
• Other minor improvements

(4.3)

• Fixed "Couldn't load the lyrics for this song" message when they are restricted on Musixmatch
• Option to show fallback reasons in the lyrics card header
• Updated OpenSpotifySafariExtension no longer mismatches on links like charts.spotify.com

(4.2)

• Real fix for crashes with LRCLIB
• The tweak now searches only songs on Genius (no articles anymore)
• Improved URLSession intercepts (fixes #182 and likely resolves login issues)
• Fixed iPad Musixmatch token and blank area issues
• Added Lyrics Colors option
• Added version section and checking for update

(4.1)

• Original colors for lyrics available on Spotify
• Fixed LRCLIB lyrics crash for some songs and issue of the settings view being too wide on iPad (pull request)
• Overwrite Configuration option. Try using it if you experience issues like appearing ads; it might help, but it's not guaranteed
• Musixmatch invalid token popup and better token input
• Dynamic Premium patching method by default

• Dynamic Premium Patching! - The tweak can now intercept Spotify requests to load user data, deserialize it, and modify the parameters in real-time. You can select the Dynamic Premium patching method in the EeveeSpotify settings.
• Do Not Patch Premium option (for users with an active Premium subscription)
• Reset Data option
• Fixed native popups white background bug
• Fixed opening Spotify links in the app when it's closed

NOTE: When updating from an older tweak version, you need to go to EeveeSpotify settings and set the Premium patching method (either static or dynamic).


(From v3.1)

• Genius Fallback: Load lyrics from Genius if there is a problem with LRCLIB or Musixmatch
• Updated OpenSpotifySafariExtension: Now supports all Spotify links and works great
• Dark PopUps option
• Improved lyrics colors (not so light and washed out, looks more like the original)
• Improved song search algorithm on Genius or LRCLIB
• Fixed EeveeSpotify settings crash when tapping on tabbar
• Updated Musixmatch token alert message; the tweak now allows you to paste debug info

• EeveeSpotify now supports LRCLIB and Musixmatch time-synced lyrics sources! You can select your preferred source in the tweak settings
• Lyrics colors are now normalized
• Fixed Genius issue where the tweak would pick a translation instead of the original lyrics

• Fixed app crashing when opening the player
• EeveeSpotify now replaces Spotify monthly limited lyrics with Genius! (If it shows the limit has been reached there are no lyrics available on genius, this is different to the lyrics spotify provide)
• Added OpenWithSpotify extension to open Spotify links in safari (must be enabled)
• Updated Spotify to v8.9.36
• Replaced Spotify v8.6.42 (Spotilife) with Spotify v8.9.34 (Eevee)

apps.name: Spotify++ (Old)
apps.subtitle: The original Spotilife tweak, along with other tweaks
apps.localizedDescription:
USE THIS IF YOU DO NOT LIKE THE NEW ONE OR IF ITS NOT WORKING

I would highly recommend you use the new Spotify tweak as it has been updated to work on newer Spotify versions and is currently being updated. However this tweak may stop working in the near future as it is an old version.



Spotify++ contants a tweak that activates Premium. As well as a number of tweaks to customise the UI and improve the overall user experience.

Here are the following tweaks:

• Spotilife - Premium for free.

• Sposify - A Tweak to customize your Spotify App UI and expand functionalities.

• Volify - Adds a volume slider to Spotify.

• SpotifyAllowSetting - Allows you to access all of the settings in Spotify that are normally disabled when someone else is playing music from another device.

• SpotifyNoPodcasts - Hides Podcasts from from Home and Library

• SpotifyHighQuality - Enables 'Very High' Quality in Audio Quality settings

•TrueShuffle - Enables true random shuffling (Spotify prioritizes Songs you have listened to more often by default)

• Spoticentre - Centres the song/artist in now playing (Only working on some devices)



NOTE

The ‘Car’ setting has been replaced with the sposify tweak settings so unfortunatley you cannot change car settings - all good tho, nobody use that shi anyways, and when car view enables when u in the car, just click ‘turn off car view’ at the top right corner.


All tweaks are injected by myself, WuXu, and ensured to be working perfectly ;)

apps.name: YouTube++
apps.subtitle: The All-In-One Tweak for YouTube.
apps.localizedDescription:
Tweak preferences can be found in the YouTube Settings

Features:

• Download videos, audio (including audio track selection), thumbnails, posts, and profile pictures
• Copy video, comment, and post information
• Interface customization: Remove feed elements, reorder tabs, enable OLED mode, and as use Shorts-only mode
• Player settings: Gestures, default quality, preferred audio track
• Save, Load and Restore settings. Clear cache once or automatically on app startup
• Built-in SponsorBlock
• And much, much more

apps.name: Duolingo++
apps.subtitle: Duolingo with Super Duolingo Activated!
apps.localizedDescription:
Learn a new language with the world’s most-downloaded education app! Duolingo is the fun, free app for learning 40+ languages through quick, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build your vocabulary and grammar skills.

Designed by language experts and loved by hundreds of millions of learners worldwide, Duolingo helps you prepare for real conversations in Spanish, French, Chinese, Italian, German, English, and more.

Whether you’re learning a language for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you’ll love learning with Duolingo.

Why Duolingo?
• Duolingo is fun and effective. Game-like lessons and fun characters help you build solid speaking, reading, listening, and writing skills.

• Duolingo works. Designed by language experts, Duolingo has a science-based teaching methodology proven to foster long-term language retention.

• Track your progress. Work toward your language learning goals with playful rewards and achievements when you make practicing a daily habit!

• Join 300+ million learners. Stay motivated with competitive Leaderboards as you learn alongside our global community.

• Every language course is free. Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian!

versions.localizedDescription: • Duolingo Updated to v7.29.0
• Duolingo Updated to v7.9.0
• Duolingo Updated to v6.196.0

apps.name: Messenger++
apps.subtitle: The ultimate Facebook Messenger tweak!
apps.localizedDescription:
Shark is the ultimate Facebook Messenger tweak. It is the first and only tweak to add additional security to the app. You can access the tweak settings on the Messenger's settings page.

Features
- Disable Marking Messages
- Disable Marking Stories
- Disable Typing Status
- Save Story images and videos

Authentication
- Shark adds an extra layer of security with Face ID/Touch ID to view the Messenger App

Note: There is a bug where nothing loads when you first sign in. Simply relaunch the app to fix this issue.
